main event: A farmer in Dowagiac, Michigan reported watching a flying saucer-shaped object launch from a G-54 military aircraft on June 29, 1950.
interesting points: The object was saucer-shaped, about 25-30 feet in diameter and 12-15 feet thick.
The object launched from the belly of the G-54 aircraft, then rapidly climbed and outpaced the plane, disappearing from view within 5 seconds.
The top of the object looked like chrome, with a small dome, while the bottom was dull gray.
The farmer, John Keller, initially did not believe what he saw until he witnessed it himself.
Keller's two young sons also saw the object launch from the G-54.
sighted object: a saucer-shaped object that launched from a G-54 military aircraft
witnesses: a farmer named John Keller and his two sons
photographs: no, the report does not mention any photographs
